name: YAOCALLI
description:
CONTROLS

GAME

[CLICK] To Select & Add, Upgrade or Remove Tower

CAMERA

[WASD] To move

[ARROWS] To move

[SCROLL] To zoom

OBJECTIVE

Survive enemy waves as long as you can. Good Luck!

STORY

Hernán Cortés, conqueror of Mexico, spent months planning a strategy and forging alliances with adjacent tribes to confront the great city of Tenochtitlan. The battle began on May 26, 1521.

The Aztec people endured 3 months before falling on August 13 of the same year.

This game commemorates the defense of the city.

REFERENCES

MenuMusic: Alexandr Zhelanov https://soundcloud.com/alexandr-zhelanov

Entrance sound: https://freesound.org/people/CosmicD/sounds/133008/
